        </div><div class="row fixedElement lg-color">
          <ul style="margin: 0;">

            <li>
                <div class="col s12 m5 l4"><form class="league-form title" action="#">

                  <h4 class="page-title">2021-2022 Premier League Player Salaries</h4>
                </div><div class="col s12">
                    <div class="description-container">
                      <div class="col s12">
                        <div class="divider-filters" style="margin: 5px 0 10px;"></div>
                      </div>
                      <h6 class="description-text">All Premier League Salaries for the 2021-2022 Season. The Top 10 Premier League Highest Paid Players is led by Cristiano Ronaldo (Centre-Forward) with an Annual Gross Salary of £45,450,000, or £874,038 per week. Cristiano Ronaldo, who is 36 years old, has 2 years and £90,900,000 gross remaining on his contract with Manchester United. All figures are not inclusive of bonuses or incentives. Actual salaries may vary.</h6>

    $(document).ready(function() {

      // table
      $table.bootstrapTable({
        search: false,
        fixedColumns: true,
        fixedNumber: 1,
        data: data,
      });

      // table placeholders
      $('.form-control.search-input').attr('placeholder', 'Search');
      $('.form-control.bootstrap-table-filter-control-age.search-input').attr('placeholder', '>,>=,<=,<');
      $('.form-control.bootstrap-table-filter-control-club.search-input').attr('placeholder', 'Search');
    });

    // buttons
    $(function() {
      $btn_eur.click(function () {
        $("#btn_eur").addClass("active");
        $("#btn_gbp").removeClass("active");
        $("#btn_usd").removeClass("active");
        if ($("#btn_gross").hasClass("active")) {

          // EUR
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'weekly_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'annual_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'total_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_net_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_eur')

          // GBP
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_net_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_gbp')

          // USD
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_net_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_usd')
        }
        if ($("#btn_net").hasClass("active")) {

          // EUR
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_gross_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'weekly_net_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'annual_net_eur')
          $table.bootstrapTable('showColumn', 'total_net_eur')

          // GBP
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_gross_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_net_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_gbp')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_gbp')

          // USD
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_gross_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'weekly_net_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_usd')
        }
      })
      $btn_gbp.click(function () {
        $("#btn_eur").removeClass("active");
        $("#btn_gbp").addClass("active");
        $("#btn_usd").removeClass("active");
        if ($("#btn_gross").hasClass("active")) {

          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_gbp')

          // USD

          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'annual_net_usd')
          $table.bootstrapTable('hideColumn', 'total_net_usd')
